summary: This document consists of email correspondence regarding a meeting agenda involving several individuals from Deutsche Bank. Amanda Kirby and Paul Morris discuss a scheduling issue related to Caroline Kitidis, who is confirmed for a meeting the following morning.

persons.name: Amanda Kirby
persons.context: Amanda Kirby is coordinating a meeting and confirming details with Paul Morris regarding Caroline Kitidis's calendar.

persons.name: Paul Morris
persons.context: Paul Morris is involved in the email exchange about the meeting agenda and scheduling.

persons.name: Caroline V. Kitidis
persons.role: Managing Director / Head of Key Client Partners & Wealth Investment Coverage - Americas
persons.context: Caroline Kitidis is the subject of the scheduling discussion, confirming her attendance for a meeting.

persons.name: Monica Gilkinson
persons.context: Monica Gilkinson is mentioned as having called Amanda Kirby regarding an issue with Caroline's calendar.

connections.description: Amanda and Paul are discussing meeting arrangements, indicating a working relationship.
Paul is coordinating with Caroline regarding her meeting schedule, indicating a professional connection.
Amanda is involved in confirming Caroline's meeting details, suggesting a working relationship.
Monica contacted Amanda regarding Caroline's calendar, indicating a collaborative relationship.

keyFacts: The email correspondence is dated October 22, 2013.
Amanda Kirby confirms that Caroline Kitidis is set for a meeting at 8 AM the following morning.
Monica Gilkinson is mentioned as having called Amanda regarding an issue with Caroline's calendar.
Caroline Kitidis is identified as a Managing Director at Deutsche Bank.
The document is marked as confidential and for internal use only.
